1.name: Taxi Driver
1.description: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action by attempting to liberate a presidential campaign worker and an underage prostitute.

2.name: Rocky
2.description: A small-time boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight a heavy-weight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

3.name: A Star Is Born
3.description: A has-been rock star falls in love with a young, up-and-coming songstress.

4.name: Carrie
4.description: Carrie White, a shy, friendless teenage girl who is sheltered by her domineering, religious mother, unleashes her telekinetic powers after being humiliated by her classmates at her senior prom.

5.name: All the President's Men
5.description: "The Washington Post" reporters Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein uncover the details of the Watergate scandal that leads to President Richard Nixon's resignation.

6.name: King Kong
6.description: A petroleum exploration expedition comes to an isolated island and encounters a colossal giant gorilla.

7.name: Logan's Run
7.description: An idyllic science fiction future has one major drawback: life must end at the age of thirty.

8.name: Maîtresse
8.description: A common thief (Depardieu) breaks into the house of a professional dominatrix (Ogier), and begins to help her "train" her clients. Though this world is alien to his experience, he finds ...                See full summary »

9.name: Network
9.description: A television network cynically exploits a deranged former anchor's ravings and revelations about the news media for its own profit.

10.name: The Man Who Fell to Earth
10.description: An alien must pose as a human to save his dying planet, but a woman and greed of other men create complications.

11.name: The Bad News Bears
11.description: An aging, down-on-his-luck ex-minor leaguer coaches a team of misfits in an ultra-competitive California little league.

12.name: The Omen
12.description: Mysterious deaths surround an American ambassador. Could the child that he is raising actually be the Antichrist? The Devil's own son?

13.name: The Outlaw Josey Wales
13.description: A Missouri farmer joins a Confederate guerrilla unit and winds up on the run from the Union soldiers who murdered his family.

14.name: In the Realm of the Senses
14.description: A passionate telling of the story of Sada Abe, a woman whose affair with her master led to a sexual obsession which then came to a violent end.

15.name: Marathon Man
15.description: A graduate history student is unwittingly caught in the middle of an international conspiracy involving stolen diamonds, an exiled Nazi war criminal, and a rogue government agent.

16.name: The Cassandra Crossing
16.description: Passengers on a European train have been exposed to a deadly disease. Nobody will let them off the train. So what happens next?

17.name: Bugsy Malone
17.description: The classic gangster story of Bugsy Malone told with an all-child cast.

18.description: The epic tale of a class struggle in twentieth century Italy, as seen through the eyes of two childhood friends on opposing sides.

19.name: Stay Hungry
19.description: A syndicate wants to buy a whole district to rebuild it. They've bought every house except the small gym "Olympic", where Mr. Austria Joe Santo prepares for the Mr. Universum championships ...                See full summary »

20.name: The Tenant
20.description: A bureaucrat rents a Paris apartment where he finds himself drawn into a rabbit hole of dangerous paranoia.

21.name: The Little Girl Who Lives Down the Lane
21.description: 13-year-old Rynn Jacobs lives alone in a high-class Quebec small town, but unknown to the neighbors, she is leading a secret and dangerous life.

22.name: Murder by Death
22.description: Five famous literary detective characters and their sidekicks are invited to a bizarre mansion to solve an even stranger mystery.

23.name: Midway
23.description: A dramatization of the battle that was widely heralded as a turning point of the Pacific Theatre of World War II.

24.name: The Shootist
24.description: A dying gunfighter spends his last days looking for a way to die with a minimum of pain and a maximum of dignity.

25.name: The Message
25.description: This epic historical drama chronicles the life and times of Muhammad and serves as an introduction to early Islamic history.

26.name: Assault on Precinct 13
26.description: An unlikely partnership between a Highway Patrol Officer, two criminals and a station secretary is formed to defend a defunct Los Angeles precinct office against a siege by a bloodthirsty street gang.

27.name: The Missouri Breaks
27.description: Tom Logan is a horse thief. Rancher David Braxton has horses, and a daughter, worth stealing. But Braxton has just hired Lee Clayton, an infamous "regulator", to hunt down the horse thieves; one at a time.

28.name: Squirm
28.description: A storm causes some power lines to break and touch the ground, drawing millions of man-eating worms out of the earth, and into town where they quickly start munching on the locals.

29.name: The Killing of a Chinese Bookie
29.description: A proud strip club owner is forced to come to terms with himself as a man, when his gambling addiction gets him in hot water with the mob, who offer him only one alternative.

30.name: The Eagle Has Landed
30.description: A German plot to kidnap Sir Winston Churchill unfolds at the height of World War II.

31.name: Freaky Friday
31.description: A mother and daughter find their personalities switched and have to live each other's lives on one strange Friday.

32.name: The Pink Panther Strikes Again
32.description: Charles Dreyfus, who has finally cracked over inspector Clouseau's antics, escapes from a mental institution and launches an elaborate plan to get rid of Clouseau once and for all.

33.name: The Enforcer
33.description: Dirty Harry must foil a terrorist organization made up of disgruntled Vietnam veterans. But this time, he's teamed with a rookie female partner that he's not too excited to be working with.

34.name: Alice Sweet Alice
34.description: In 1960s New Jersey, a withdrawn adolescent girl is suspected of her younger sister's brutal murder during her first communion, as well as a series of stabbings that follow.

35.name: The Last Tycoon
35.description: F. Scott Fitzgerald's novel is brought to life in this story of a movie producer slowly working himself to death.

36.name: Salon Kitty
36.description: Kitty runs a brothel in Nazi Germany where the soldiers come to "relax". Recording devices have been installed in each room by a power hungry army official, who plans to use the information to blackmail Hitler and gain power himself.

37.name: A Real Young Girl
37.description: Reluctantly, a sulky adolescent returns to her parents' house for yet another boring summer vacation, dabbling in desire and the art of desirability, eventually mixing reality with vision, caged fantasies with the fierce female sexuality.

38.name: Car Wash
38.description: A comedic take on the daily life of a car wash employees, chronicling their hopes, fears, joys, dreams and tribulations. And meeting a few eccentric costumers along the way.

39.name: Obsession
39.description: A wealthy New Orleans businessman becomes obsessed with a young woman who resembles his wife.

40.name: Bobbie Jo and the Outlaw
40.description: A young country-star wannabe takes off from her carhop career to join with a young, modern Billy the Kid wannabe for an adventure in theft, murder and mayhem.

41.name: Fellini's Casanova
41.description: Casanova is a libertine, performing seductions and sexual feats. But he is really interested in someone, and is he really an interesting person? Is he really alive?

42.name: Up!
42.description: This kicks off with the murder of one Adolf Schwartz (who bears a striking resemblance to another famous Adolf) by placing a ravenous piranha fish in his bathtub. Who did it? No-one knows ...                See full summary »

43.name: Family Plot
43.description: A phony psychic/con artist and her taxi driver/private investigator boyfriend encounter a pair of serial kidnappers while trailing a missing heir in California.

44.name: The Big Bus
44.description: The ultimate disaster film parody. A nuclear powered bus is going Non-stop from New York to Denver and is plagued by disasters due to the machinations of a mysterious group allied with the ...                See full summary »

45.name: Burnt Offerings
45.description: A family moves into an old, haunted house that regenerates itself by feeding off of the life forces of its injured occupants.

46.name: Silent Movie
46.description: A film director and his strange friends struggle to produce the first major silent feature film in forty years.

47.name: Futureworld
47.description: Upon uncovering the dirty secret of futuristic theme-park Futureworld, an ex-employee is killed after he tips off two other reporters who decide to do an undercover investigation.

48.name: The Gumball Rally
48.description: An eclectic group of people take part in a secret, and illegal, cross country road race.

49.name: God Told Me To
49.description: A New York detective investigates a series of murders committed by random New Yorkers who claim that "God told them to."

50.name: Silver Streak
50.description: On a long-distance train trip, a man finds romance but also finds himself in danger of being killed, or at least pushed off the train.
